{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=MVBR1210 |revision=C |fcc_date=12/06/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, 3G mobile router, analog phone gateway, |fcc_id=PY311300175, N7NMC8705, |ic_id=4054A-11300175, 2417C-MC8705, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4717A1 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EMI-12G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-3 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (USB) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4717A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module=Sierra Wireless AirPrime MC8705 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (USB) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=MDMxxxx |wi2_802dot11_protocols=HSPA+ |wi2_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G (HSPA+), |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR-3G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR-3G$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Mobile Voice HSPA+ Broadband 11n Wireless Router}} :[http://support.netgear.com/app/products/model/a_id/19745 Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=MVBR1210C|vs_id=19745}}
There is a [[SMSC]] USB2514B USB 2.0 Hub and :[[Realtek]] ALC5631V Audio Codec on-board. Default settings are per the FCC manual.
